author: hiranya
msg: Fixing SYNAPSE-870. Iterate mediator is misinterpretting being sequential as being asynchronous, where actually it should be the opposite. That is being sequential is not being asynchronous. I've fixed this issue and now the iterate mediator is async (not sequential) by default, and setting sequential attribute to true will make it not async.
